title: Photocatalytic CO2 reduction to methanol integrated with the oxidative coupling of thiols for Sâ€“X (X = S, C) bond formation over an Fe3O4/BiVO4 composite
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1750-1760
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01651J, Paper
Nitish Saini, Sandhya Saini, Santanu Majumder, Kyra Sedransk Campbell, Suman L. Jain
This work demonstrated a dual functional approach for CO2 reduction coupled with oxidative coupling of thiols in a single reaction system to get the co-production of high-value chemicals using light energy.
